name: Sheepwalking
description:
In this Game, you are a young Sheep called Wooly, who got stuck in her Dreams, causing her to stay asleep as long as she doesn't get out of there.

   

With a little help of your guarding german shepherd Rex you collect Alarm Clocks while exploring the Dreamworld. 

But watch out! If the dream turns bad, you have to fight Wolves to not get killed by them.
